Package com.soa.rs.discordbot.bot.events

Provides the necessary classes for any form of event run by the discord bot.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SoaTaskScheduler
    Generic interface used to represent a repeated, automated task.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSoaMsgRcvEvent
    This abstract class can be used by MessageReceivedEvents for some convienence methods.
    SoaAdminNewsEvent
    The SoaAdminNewsEvent can be used for an admin (Lian/Eldar or Jeff) to provide information for the bot to repeat in the specified channel.
    SoaBotInfoEvent
    The SoaBotInfoEvent displays general information about the bot.
    SoaDefaultRssParser
    This class serves as a base for any RSS parsing that will be done from the forums.
    SoaEventListerScheduler
    Handles the scheduling for the SoaEventLister automated task.
    SoaEventListerTask
    The SoaEventListerTask can be run in one of two modes: As a TimerTask, executed once a day.
    SoaEventListParser
    The SoaEventListParser retrieves the RSS feed provided by the SoA forums calendar and parses through the entries to present the current day's upcoming events.
    SoaHelpEvent
    The SoaHelpEvent displays a help message of the bot's commands
    SoaMusicPlayer
    The SoaMusicPlayer is a slightly modified version of the implementation example of the JDA-Player library which can be found on Github: https://github.com/DV8FromTheWorld/JDA-Player
    SoaNewsListerScheduler
    Handles the scheduling for the SoaNewsLister automated task
    SoaNewsListerTask
    The SoaNewsListerTask is executed once per hour, and will fetch information from the News and Announcements forum along with the Promotions forum to announce within the Discord channel.
    SoaNewsListParser
    The SoaNewsListParser grabs information of new topics from the News and announcements forum along with from the Promotions and Welcomes forum

Package com.soa.rs.discordbot.bot.events Description

Provides the necessary classes for any form of event run by the discord bot. Scheduled tasks and command-based events should be contained within this package.
